modules.title: Leadership Operating System
modules.description: Defines what leadership actually controls and what it doesn't. Introduces the leadership scan: the patterns, signals, and early indicators effective leaders monitor daily. Includes self-diagnostic to assess whether you're leading or just managing tasks.

modules.title: Earning Credibility
modules.description: Explains why competence alone doesn't create followership. Covers trust as an operational performance multiplier, visible leadership without micromanagement, integrity under pressure, and how leaders lose credibility. Includes trust breakdown case analysis.

modules.title: Leading Under Pressure
modules.description: Addresses how stress degrades leadership effectiveness and team performance. Teaches composure maintenance, real-time communication during system failures, decision-making with incomplete information, and leading through full-scale crises.

modules.title: Developing People
modules.description: Focuses on delegation as capability-building tool, matching challenge level to individual readiness, understanding why high performers leave, differentiating coaching from mentoring, and analyzing delegation failures.

modules.title: Accountability and Performance
modules.description: Differentiates between standards enforcement and punitive culture. Covers performance conversations that improve outcomes, managing declining performers, progressive accountability frameworks, and making termination decisions.

modules.title: Team Dynamics and Culture
modules.description: Teaches team formation stages, building psychological safety, managing diverse personalities and conflict styles, creating high-performance culture, and identifying and intervening in toxic team dynamics.

modules.title: Strategic Leadership
modules.description: Covers vision creation and articulation, translating strategy into operational action, leading organizational change, managing resistance and building buy-in, and executing strategic plans effectively.

modules.title: Decision-Making Frameworks
modules.description: Teaches risk assessment and management, ethical decision-making under pressure, balancing competing priorities, and knowing when to decide yourself versus when to delegate or escalate decisions.

modules.title: Influence Without Authority
modules.description: Teaches leading upward effectively, lateral leadership and peer influence, navigating organizational politics with integrity, building coalitions, and managing organizational resistance.

modules.title: Advanced Communication
modules.description: Covers strategic messaging during normal operations, stress, and post-incident; leading difficult conversations like layoffs and restructuring; cross-cultural and multi-generational communication; remote team leadership; and crisis communication strategy.

modules.title: Self-Leadership
modules.description: Focuses on self-awareness and identifying personal blind spots, managing leader stress and burnout, continuous learning and adaptation practices, and creating a personal leadership development plan.

modules.title: Organizational Leadership Systems
modules.description: Addresses talent assessment and succession planning, building performance measurement systems, creating mentoring culture, leading through organizational growth versus decline, post-failure recovery, and executive leadership transitions.
